Returns & Refunds

We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase

How to Return an Item

Follow these simple steps to return your purchase

1

Contact Us

Reach out to our customer service team within 30 days of delivery to initiate a return.

2

Get Authorization

We'll provide you with a Return Authorization (RA) number and return instructions.

3

Package & Ship

Package the item securely in its original packaging and ship it back using the provided label.

4

Receive Refund

Once we receive and inspect the item, we'll process your refund within 5-7 business days.

Return Policy

30-Day Return Window

Items must be returned within 30 days of delivery date.

Original Condition

Items must be unused, unopened, and in original packaging with all tags and labels attached.

Proof of Purchase

Original invoice or order confirmation is required for all returns.

Non-Returnable Items

Custom orders, personalized items, and software licenses are not eligible for return.

Important Information

  • Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer unless the item is defective or incorrect.
  • Refunds will be issued to the original payment method used for the purchase.
  • Processing time for refunds is 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.
  • For damaged or defective items, please contact us immediately for expedited processing.
  • International returns may be subject to customs fees and duties.

Ready to Start a Return?

Contact our customer service team to begin the return process
